name: HogarSmartControls
0:
”Alexa, turn on Living Room Fan”
”Alexa, turn off Living Room Fan”
”Alexa, turn on Living Room TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Using voice to control smart devices via Hogar Controls cloud.
It make your home smart and can interactive with you via voice.
